public static Class9 addDTab(int i)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 0;
class9.anInt217 = 0;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = 512;
class9.anInt267 = 334;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 0;
return class9;

}

public static void addText(int id, String text, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 wid[], int idx, int color) {
Class9 Tab = addTab(id);
Tab.anInt250 = id;
Tab.anInt236 = id;
Tab.anInt262 = 4;
Tab.anInt217 = 0;
Tab.anInt220 = 174;
Tab.anInt267 = 11;
Tab.anInt214 = 0;
Tab.aByte254 = 0;
Tab.anInt230 = -1;
Tab.aBoolean223 = false;
Tab.aBoolean268 = true;
Tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_243 = wid[idx];
Tab.aString248 = text;
Tab.aString228 = “”;
Tab.anInt232 = color;
Tab.anInt219 = 0;
Tab.anInt216 = 0;
Tab.anInt239 = 0;
}
public static void addCloseButton(int i)
{
Class9 Close = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
Close.anInt250 = i;
Close.anInt236 = i;
Close.anInt262 = 5;
Close.anInt217 = 6;
Close.anInt214 = 0;
Close.anInt220 = 21;
Close.anInt267 = 21;
Close.aByte254 = 0;
Close.anInt230 = 52;
Close.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = loadAscheriitSprite(1, “death”);
Close.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = loadAscheriitSprite(1, “death”);
Close.aString221 = “Close Window”;
}
public static void AddImage(int i, int j, int k, boolean transparent, int amount)
{
Class9 Hexyl = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
Hexyl.anInt250 = i;
Hexyl.anInt236 = i;
if(transparent){
Hexyl.anInt262 = 8;
Hexyl.transtAmount = amount;
} else {
Hexyl.anInt262 = 5;
}
Hexyl.anInt217 = 1;
Hexyl.anInt214 = 0;
Hexyl.anInt220 = 20;
Hexyl.anInt267 = 20;
Hexyl.aByte254 = 0;
Hexyl.anInt230 = 52;
Hexyl.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSprite(j, “Hex”);
Hexyl.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSprite(k, “Hex”);
}
public static void AddButton(int i, int j, int k, String s)
{
Class9 Hexyl = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
Hexyl.anInt250 = i;
Hexyl.anInt236 = i;
Hexyl.anInt262 = 5;
Hexyl.anInt217 = 1;
Hexyl.anInt214 = 0;
Hexyl.anInt220 = 30;
Hexyl.anInt267 = 42;
Hexyl.aByte254 = 0;
Hexyl.anInt230 = 52;
Hexyl.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSprite(j, “Hex”);
Hexyl.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSprite(k, “Hex”);
Hexyl.aString221 = s;
}

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 LoadSprite(int i, String s)
{
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) {
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
try {
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1((new StringBuilder()).append("./Sprites/").append(s).append(" “).append(i).append(”.png").toString());
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
} catch(Exception exception) {
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}[/CODE]Search for:

aClass44 = aClass44;Under it add:

BountyHunter1(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4); BountyHunterRogues(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4); BountyHunters(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);Download this folder and paste it in your client
http://www.mediafire.com/?kkutymgozy1

Now to add the skulls
Download Tom’s cache suite here: http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=128224

Open up your cache and go to
Edit/View Image Archives -> Media -> Headicons_pk.dat

Add these skulls in that category as:
6 -
7 -
8 -
9 -
10 -

There you go, your done…congrats[/quote]

Good Job

Read full topic
